declarations.comments:
The representation of a color.

Note:
- The `Eq` instance compares two `Color`s by comparing their (integer) RGB
  values. This is different from comparing the HSL values (for example,
  HSL has many different representations of black (arbitrary hue and
  saturation values).
- Colors outside the sRGB gamut which cannot be displayed on a typical
  computer screen can not be represented by `Color`.
declarations.title: Color

declarations.comments: A vector or direction.
declarations.title: Vector

declarations.comments: A 3D point.
declarations.title: Point

declarations.comments: An angle in radians.
declarations.title: Angle

declarations.comments: A `Face` is a list of (at least) three points which all lie in a plane.
declarations.title: Face

declarations.comments: A Shape consists of several `Face`s.
declarations.title: Shape

declarations.comments: Project a 2D path onto the xy plane and extrude it by the given height.
declarations.title: extrude

declarations.comments:
Create a cone-like object by extruding the points from a base path in the
xy plane to a single point above (or below) it.
declarations.title: extrudeCone

declarations.comments:
A prism, constructed from a given corner point and the width, height and
depth (dimensions in x, y, and z-direction).
declarations.title: prism

declarations.comments: A cube is a prism with three equal sides.
declarations.title: cube

declarations.comments:
A cone, determined by the center of the bottom face, the number of sides,
the radius and the height.
declarations.title: cone

declarations.comments:
A four-sided pyramid, determined by the center of the bottom face, the
base length and the height.
declarations.title: pyramid

declarations.comments:
A three-sided pyramid, determined by the center of the bottom face, the
base length and the height.
declarations.title: pyramid3

declarations.comments:
A cylinder, determined by the center of the bottom face, the number of
sides, the radius and the height.
declarations.title: cylinder

declarations.comments: Main data type for the description of a 3D isometric scene.
declarations.title: Scene

declarations.comments: Translate a scene by a given offset in x-direction.
declarations.title: translateX

declarations.comments: Translate a scene by a given offset in y-direction.
declarations.title: translateY

declarations.comments: Translate a scene by a given offset in z-direction.
declarations.title: translateZ

declarations.comments: Rotate a scene around the x-axis.
declarations.title: rotateX

declarations.comments: Rotate a scene around the y-axis.
declarations.title: rotateY

declarations.comments: Rotate a scene around the z-axis.
declarations.title: rotateZ

declarations.comments: Scale a scene by a multiplicative factor (with respect to the origin).
declarations.title: scale

declarations.comments: Fill a shape with a given base color. Individual faces can be brighter.
declarations.title: filled

declarations.comments:
Render a three-dimensional `Scene` into a two-dimensional `Drawing`, using
an isometric projection. The vector determines the direction of light.
declarations.title: renderScene

declarations.comments:
Sort the objects in a scene by depth such that they will be rendered
correctly.
declarations.title: depthSort

declarations.comments: Construct a point from x, y, and z coordinates.
declarations.title: point

declarations.comments: The origin of the 3D coordinate system.
declarations.title: origin

declarations.comments: Construct a 3D point in the xy plane from a 2D point.
declarations.title: from2D

declarations.comments: Construct a vector as a difference between two points.
declarations.title: vector

declarations.comments: Translate a given point by a vector.
declarations.title: translate

declarations.comments: The dot-product of two vectors.
declarations.title: dot

declarations.comments: The Euclidean norm of a vector.
declarations.title: norm

declarations.comments: Normalize a vector to length 1.
declarations.title: normalize

declarations.comments: The cross-product of two vectors.
declarations.title: cross

declarations.comments: Translate a point by a given offset in x-direction.
declarations.title: translateX

declarations.comments: Translate a point by a given offset in y-direction.
declarations.title: translateY

declarations.comments: Translate a point by a given offset in z-direction.
declarations.title: translateZ

declarations.comments: Rotate a point around the x-axis.
declarations.title: rotateX

declarations.comments: Rotate a point around the y-axis.
declarations.title: rotateY

declarations.comments: Rotate a point around the z-axis.
declarations.title: rotateZ

declarations.comments: Scale a point by a multiplicative factor (with respect to the origin).
declarations.title: scale

declarations.comments: Calculate the 'depth' of a point, measured from the point of the observer.
declarations.title: depth

declarations.comments: A 3D point.
declarations.title: Point

declarations.comments: A vector or direction.
declarations.title: Vector

declarations.comments: An angle in radians.
declarations.title: Angle
